subject: Barrister Malcolm Thomas
body:
Barrister Malcolm Thomas
1451 S St NW, Washington,
DC 20009
United States of America.
Direct E-mail: 
barristermalcolmthomassolicitors@consultant.com
Attn:  
These honorable chambers confirm the receipt of your email. I have not seen the payment receipt until now, please advise so that I will know my schedule.
Anticipating your prompt response.
Yours Sincerely,
Barr, Malcolm Thomas
Solicitors & Chambers.
Esq.

subject: Re:    Barrister Malcolm Thomas
body:
Hello Barrister Malcolm Thomas,

Thank you for your email. I hope you are doing well. I'm sorry, but I'm not sure what payment receipt you are referring to. Could you please provide me with more details about it? Once I have a better understanding, I'll be able to advise you accordingly.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Claire
